text: This block extracts selected type of values from a given candle list. Each candle has open price, close price, high price, low price, and open time.
This block requires a candle list as an input parameter.
In this example we extract open prices from a candle list into variable candle_list. The candle list is provided by another block (Get candle list).
In the above example it is assumed that variable candle_list is processed somewhere within other blocks.
